arts.ttl: Two in two minutes from Charlie Kelman inspires Leyton Orient to win
arts.sum: Two quick-fire goals from Charlie Kelman turned the game around after Armando Quitirna had given Crawley a 49th-minute lead from the penalty spot. Kelman now boasts eight goals in seven games, and 23 for the season in all competitions, and his second came from the spot after debutant keeper Luke Hutchinson fouled Dilan Markanday.

arts.ttl: Leyton Orientâ€™s second-half goal glut claims points against Barnsley
arts.sum: The Tykes had led 2-0 and 3-1 at Brisbane Road.

arts.ttl: Hourihane 'emotional' after being named permanent Barnsley boss
arts.sum: Barnsley appoint former captain Conor Hourihane as head coach on a permanent basis on a two-year deal.

arts.ttl: Hourihane given permanent Barnsley head coach job
arts.sum: Conor Hourihane has been named permanent head coach of Barnsley after impressing during his spell as interim boss. The 34-year-old has signed a two-year deal.

Consecutive away victories at Mansfield and Crawley has kept Leyton Orient's season alive and given them every chance of getting into the playoffs. The O's are still playing catch - with the gap to R...

arts.ttl: Preview: Leyton Orient vs. Barnsley - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Friday's League One clash between Leyton Orient and Barnsley, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
